description:
Hanai has another bone to pick with Harima! The athletic meet approaches and the class needs more muscle - especially when the guys go gaga over the new school nurse and the injuries start to pile up!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Angreifend: Hanai! Leuchtend: Karen! Wiedergetroffen: das geheimnisvolle Mädchen!
Gyakushuu no Hanai! / Senkou no Karen! / Saikai, Onee-san
Hanai Fights Back! / Karen Sparkles! / Reunion with Big Sister!
Hanain revanssi! / Salamoiva Karen! / Siskän jälleennäkeminen.
逆襲の花井! / 閃光のかれん! / 再会, お姉さん
